levels.description: The first bit is 1 if it is a weekday, and the second bit is 1 if we are on vacation. We sleep in if it is not a weekday or we're on vacation. Return :) if we sleep in, :( otherwise.

We have two monkeys, each represented by 1 bit. A monkey's bit will be 1 if it is smiling. We are in trouble if they are both smiling or if neither of them is smiling. Return :) if we are in trouble, :( otherwise.
